title: Space Invaders .apk
description:
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦	There are many arcade games in the market which are space shooter. But very few of them are addictive. 
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦	Space Galaxy Invaders is one such space shooter as well as addictive amazing shooting game. Space Galaxy Invaders is an amazing shooting game that will keep you glued. 
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦	The player controls the plane that moves through the Galaxy shooting the space invaders. The plane also has to be careful as to not get hit by the missiles or bullets of the space invaders.
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦	Controls are: 
-	Swipe left right to move
-	Press shoot button to shoot missiles

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦	Game play

The player controls a plane moving through the galaxy. As the game begins, the plane starts moving. It then proceeds to move forward automatically because its duty calls. The control the player has is swipe left right to move and press shoot button for missiles. This is the last space fighter whose mission in the spacewar is to prevent the Titan Attack or any other from the 100 Invaders and as its duty calls shudder down these deadly stars and shoot emÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ up and miss their bullet hell and be the astro avenger. The player has to be careful not with the asteroids or meteoroid but from the X Fleet of demon space attack and their missiles and bullet hell. This Spacewar is between the last space fighter or astro avenger and the space invaders like deadly stars, titan attacks, x fleet of demon space attack. One single missile will bring death.

 Unlike many other shooting games which have predesigned stages and can be played to completion, the universe of Space Galaxy Invaders is like Galaga which is procedurally generated and endless. The missiles would make a pew pew sound which brings excitement to the game.
The objective of the game is to achieve the highest score, achieved by shooting maximum enemies. The game feature online leader boards, allowing players to compete for outland games ranking.

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦	If you like space invaders, retro cosmos space,  galaga, space shooter, galaxy, pew pew, Deadly Stars, 100 Invaders, Titan Attacks, Last Space Fighter, AstroAvenger, Shudder, Duty Calls, Shoot 'em up,  Spacewar,  bullet hell, X Fleet, demon space attack you will like Space Galaxy Invaders.

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦	Features of the game:
-	The game is similar to galaga or space invaders game.
-	Space Galaxy Invaders is a space shooter game.
-	It can be single player or multi player game. You can challenge your friends on leader boards.
-	Challenge your friends online in this arcade game to a match by tapping on the Space Galaxy Invaders leader board button and then the challenge button!
-	Use your pew pew missiles in the retrocosmos space and play this fun arcade game.
-	Being based on real and accurate physics with some toony effect, it is probably the most addictive endless shooting game on mobiles!
-	A perfect time killer!
